description: '''Omary Ally Mwanga''' (born 31 December 1995), known professionally as '''Marioo''', is a Tanzanian singer, songwriter, and music producer. He is known for his hits such as ''Bia Tamu'', ''Mama Amina, Dear Ex, Raha, Mi Amor'' and ''Naogopa'', songs that have made him a household name in Tanzania and East Africa in general.
